          <title>
            <string language="en">Injectable drugs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Injizierbare Drogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Drogues injectables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Drogas injectable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Droghe iniettabili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκχύσιμα φάρμακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Drogas inyectables</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing hormonal methods for contraception. This illustration shows a vial and a syringe.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">syringe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vial</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, die hormonale 
Methoden für Empfängnisverhütung zeigen. Diese Abbildung 
zeigt eine Phiole und eine Spritze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de trois illustrations montrant des 
méthodes hormonales pour la contraception. Cette illustration 
montre une fiole et une seringue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três ilustrações que mostram métodos
hormonal para o contraception. Esta ilustração mostra um vial 
e um syringe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano i 
metodi ormonali per contraccezione. Questa illustrazione mostra 
una fiala e una siringa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ορμονικές 
μεθόδους για την αντισύλληψη. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει 
ένα φιαλίδιο και μια σύριγγα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres ilustraciones que muestran los 
métodos hormonales para la contracepción. Esta ilustración 
muestra un frasco y una jeringuilla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spritze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phiole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">seringue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fiole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">siringa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fiala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύριγγα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φιαλίδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">jeringuilla</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">frasco</string>
          </keyword>
